Trumpet of Awe.name: Trumpet of Awe
Trumpet of Awe.flavor: Astral trumpets announce your god. Your allies take heart and your enemies quail before the divine presence.
Trumpet of Awe.onHit: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier thunder damage, and the target grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.
Trumpet of Awe.effect: Each ally in the blast can make a saving throw with a bonus equal to your Charisma modifier.

Call Home the Weary.name: Call Home the Weary
Call Home the Weary.flavor: Your ally has fought well, but now must withdraw to rest and recover.
Call Home the Weary.effect: The target teleports to a square adjacent to you and can spend a healing surge, adding your Charisma modifier to the hit points regained.

Message of War.name: Message of War
Message of War.flavor: You raise your voice in song, joining your music with an angelic choir to urge your comrades to victory.
Message of War.effect: Each ally adjacent to the target can make a melee basic attack against it as a free action, with a bonus to the attack roll and the damage roll equal to your Charisma modifier.
